update.title: fedora-release-8-6.transition
update.description:
This fedora-release update introduces a new set of Fedora Updates and Updates Testing repo definitions. These new definitions point to new URLS for our update content signed with a new key. This update also provides Fedora 8 and 9's new package signing keys. This update is a transitional update to direct users at the rest of the updates in the new locations. It will be superseded by further fedora-release updates at a future date.
See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Enabling_new_signing_key for more details.
